value.title: Split text by capital letters and non/digits - Power BI  Desktop February Update 2019
value.excerpt: It took a blog post by Chris Webb for me to see this update, and maybe some of you have also missed this?  There are 4 new split by options in the Power Query User Interface and we will review them here.
